name: red-flute
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Cures attraction.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of attraction.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of attraction.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A red glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of infatuation.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A red flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of infatuation.
